# Install

## Theme Colors
1. Ghostty > Settings...
2. Paste the bellow configuration.

# Configuration
```
# Config generated by Ghostty Config

background-opacity = 0.9
background-blur-radius = 5
theme = Snazzy Soft
background = #1e1f29
foreground = #ebece6
selection-background = #81aec6
selection-foreground = #000000
cursor-color = #e4e4e4
cursor-text = #f6f6f6
palette = 0=#000000
palette = 1=#fc4346
palette = 2=#50fb7c
palette = 3=#f0fb8c
palette = 4=#49baff
palette = 5=#fc4cb4
palette = 6=#8be9fe
palette = 7=#ededec
palette = 8=#555555
palette = 9=#fc4346
palette = 10=#50fb7c
palette = 11=#f0fb8c
palette = 12=#49baff
palette = 13=#fc4cb4
palette = 14=#8be9fe
palette = 15=#ededec
font-size = 28
font-family = Hack Nerd Font Mono
font-style = Hack Nerd Font Mono
window-height = 22
window-width = 60
```
> Configuration generated by https://ghostty.zerebos.com/
